pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Methods for Climate Sciences // Absolute homogeneity tests SNHT absolute 1-breaks, 1-break, SD different from 1, 2-breaks, Buishand, Pettitt, von Neumann ratio and ratio-rank, Worsley, and Craddock, Relative homogeneity tests SNHT absolute 1-breaks, 1-break SD different from 1, 2-breaks, Peterson and Easterling, and Vincent, Differences in scale between two groups SiegelTukey, Create reference time series mean, weights/correlation, finding outliers Grubbs, ESD, MAD, Tietjen Moore, Hampel, etc.
